attributes.action: Go for it Gordon. The Country is Relying on You :-)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Just wanted to say thanks to Gordon for picking up the reins at an incredibly difficult time...

Support, gratitude and faith that you will do the right things for the country and the world.

Trying to stay positive in a period of persistant bad news. We need a strong, intelligent and trustworthy leader to get us through this period of uncertainty, doubt, fear and calamity.

Go for it!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
